setting.label: Source Media Folder 1
setting.help: Select the first folder where your media files are located (e.g., cloud drive mount point). Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Source Media Folder 2
setting.help: Select the second folder for your media files. Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Source Media Folder 3
setting.help: Select the third folder for your media files. Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Source Media Folder 4
setting.help: Select the fourth folder for your media files. Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Source Media Folder 5
setting.help: Select the fifth folder for your media files. Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Output Folder for STRM Links
setting.help: Choose where the generated .strm files (media links/playlists) will be stored.

setting.label: Included File Extensions
setting.help: Comma-separated list of video file extensions to include (e.g., .mp4,.mkv).

setting.label: Scan Subfolders Recursively
setting.help: Enable to scan all subfolders within the Source Media Folder(s).

setting.label: Maximum Scan Depth (0 for unlimited)
setting.help: Limit how many subfolder levels to scan. 0 means no limit.

setting.label: Exclude Folders (comma-separated)
setting.help: Comma-separated list of folder names to exclude from scanning (e.g., sample,temp_files).

setting.label: Exclude Filename Patterns
setting.help: Comma-separated list of words/patterns to exclude from filenames (e.g., sample,trailer).

setting.label: Minimum File Size (MB)
setting.help: Only include files larger than this size in Megabytes.

setting.label: Enable Maximum File Size
setting.help: Activate a maximum file size limit.

setting.label: Maximum File Size (MB)
setting.help: Only include files smaller than this size in Megabytes.

setting.label: Auto-create Category Folders
setting.help: Automatically create subfolders for categories (e.g., Adult, Trailers) in the Output Folder.

setting.label: Enable Adult Content Filter
setting.help: If enabled, specific adult content filtering rules will be applied.

setting.label: Adult Keywords (comma-separated)
setting.help: Keywords in filenames to identify adult content (e.g., adult,xxx).

setting.label: Adult Filename: Words to Remove
setting.help: Words to remove from adult filenames for display (e.g., adult,hd).

setting.label: Adult Filename: Words to Replace (old=new)
setting.help: Replace words in adult filenames (e.g., big=large, hot=spicy).

setting.label: Adult Filename: Enable Regex Replace
setting.help: Use a regular expression to modify adult filenames.

setting.label: Adult Regex Pattern
setting.help: Regular expression pattern to match in adult filenames.

setting.label: Adult Regex Replace With
setting.help: Replacement string for the adult regex pattern.

setting.label: Max Playlist Backups to Keep
setting.help: Number of old playlist backups to keep.

setting.label: Auto-update Playlists on Kodi Startup
setting.help: Automatically scan and update all playlists when Kodi starts.

setting.label: Cleanup Playlists on Startup
setting.help: Remove links to missing files from all playlists during Kodi startup.

setting.label: Default Download Path (Regular Content)
setting.help: Choose the default folder where downloaded files will be saved for regular content.

setting.label: Adult Content Download Path
setting.help: Choose a specific folder for downloaded adult content. Falls back to Default Download Path if empty.

setting.label: Downloaded Filename: Words to Remove
setting.help: Words to remove from downloaded filenames for display.

setting.label: Downloaded Filename: Words to Replace (old=new)
setting.help: Replace words in downloaded filenames (e.g., 720p=HD).

setting.label: Downloaded Filename: Enable Regex Replace
setting.help: Use a regular expression to modify downloaded filenames.

setting.label: Downloaded Regex Pattern
setting.help: Regular expression pattern to match in downloaded filenames.

setting.label: Downloaded Regex Replace With
setting.help: Replacement string for the downloaded regex pattern.

setting.label: Show 'Quick Scan' in Main Menu
setting.help: Adds a 'Quick Scan (No Playlist)' option to the main menu for quick folder content review without creating a playlist.

setting.label: Logging Level
setting.help: Sets the verbosity of logging messages (0=Debug, 1=Info, 2=Warning, 3=Error, 4=None).
